entry.title: Houthis Target U.S. Ship in Third Attack on Commercial Vessels in Just Three Days
entry.summary: Biden acknowledged Thursday that U.S. strikes have not been effective in deterring the Houthis, but said they will continue nevertheless.

entry.summary: DANA G. SMITH2024å¹´1æœˆ18æ—¥ Keith Negley My father decided to start learning French when he was 57. He hired a tutor to meet with him twice a week and diligently completed his homework before every lesson. Before long, he was visiting the French bakery across town to practice his pronunciation (and buy macarons). Now, 20 years later, heâ€™s on his third tutor. çˆ¶äº²åœ¨57å²æ—¶å†³å®šå¼€å§‹å­¦æ³•è¯­ã€‚ä»–è¯·äº†ä¸€ä½å®¶æ•™ï¼Œæ¯å‘¨ä¸Šä¸¤æ¬¡è¯¾ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æ¯æ¬¡è¯¾å‰éƒ½å‹¤å¥‹åœ°å®Œæˆä½œä¸šã€‚æ²¡è¿‡å¤šä¹…ï¼Œä»–å°±å¼€å§‹å»é•‡å­å¦ä¸€å¤´é‚£å®¶æ³•å›½é¢åŒ…åº—ç»ƒä¹ å‘éŸ³ï¼ˆä¹°é©¬å¡é¾™ï¼‰ã€‚ç°åœ¨ï¼Œ20å¹´è¿‡å»äº†ï¼Œå®¶æ•™å·²ç»æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªäº†ã€‚ On the surface, his retirement hobby seems a little random â€” our family has no connection to French-speaking countries â€” but his motivation ran deeper than a passion for pastries. My grandmother developed signs of Alzheimerâ€™s disease in her early 70s, and studies suggest that being bilingual can delay the onset of the condition by up to five â€¦

entry.title: Francis Collins Admits Plausibility of Lab-Leak Theory in House Testimony
entry.summary: The former NIH director also admitted that the six-foot social-distancing recommendation was likely not based on any scientific data.

entry.title: Trump Ordered to Pay New York Times Nearly $400,000 after Failed Lawsuit
entry.summary: Trump filed a $100 million lawsuit in 2021 after his niece, Mary Trump, gave his confidential tax records to journalists at the paper.

entry.title: U.S. Launches Second Round of Air Strikes on Yemen-Based Houthis

entry.title: DeSantis Orders Florida Universities to Expedite Transfer Process for Jewish Students Facing Persecution
entry.summary: The order will clear credit-hour and application-window requirements that would hinder an otherwise academically eligible transfer student.

entry.title: Not-China Is Much Bigger Than China
entry.summary: The U.S. should pursue free-trade agreements with friendly countries as part of its strategy to counter China.

entry.title: The Progressive Blob Is Consuming Our Institutions
entry.summary: Elites putting progressivism ahead of their institutional duties is a threat to everyone.

Warren/Associated Press An emergency landing on Friday of an Alaska Airlines Boeing 737 Max 9 jet in Portland, Ore., led the Federal Aviation Administration to order some U.S. airlines to stop using some Max 9 planes until they are inspected. The order affects about 171 planes owned by Alaska, United and other airlines. The episode also raised troubling new questions about the safety of a workhorse aircraft design dogged by years of problems and multiple deadly crashes. å‘¨äº”ï¼Œé˜¿æ‹‰æ–¯åŠ èˆªç©ºå…¬å¸çš„ä¸€æ¶æ³¢éŸ³737 Max 9é£æœºåœ¨ä¿„å‹’å†ˆå·æ³¢ç‰¹å…°ç´§æ€¥é™è½ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´ç¾å›½è”é‚¦èˆªç©ºç®¡ç†å±€å‘½ä»¤ä¸€äº›ç¾å›½èˆªç©ºå…¬å¸ï¼Œåœ¨å®Œæˆç›¸å…³æ£€æŸ¥å‰åœæ­¢ä½¿ç”¨éƒ¨åˆ†Max 9é£æœºã€‚è¿™é¡¹å‘½ä»¤å½±å“åˆ°é˜¿æ‹‰æ–¯åŠ èˆªç©ºã€ç¾è”èˆªå’Œå…¶ä»–èˆªç©ºå…¬å¸æ‹¥æœ‰çš„çº¦171æ¶é£æœºã€‚è¿™ä¸€äº‹ä»¶è¿˜å¼•å‘äº†ä»¤äººä¸å®‰çš„æ–°é—®é¢˜â€”â€”è¿™ä¸€å¤šå¹´æ¥é—®é¢˜é¢‘å‘ã€å¤šæ¬¡å‘ç”Ÿè‡´å‘½å æœºäº‹æ•…çš„ä¸»åŠ›é£æœºï¼Œå…¶è®¾è®¡æ˜¯å¦å®‰å…¨ã€‚ No one was seriously injured in Fridayâ€™s incidenâ€¦

entry.title: Mike DeWineâ€™s Disappointing Veto
entry.summary: By rejecting a bill to protect children from gender surgeries and keep men out of womenâ€™s sports, the governor has failed Ohioans.

entry.title: Ohio Governor Signs Emergency Order Banning Child Transition Surgeries after Vetoing Similar Bill
entry.summary: The bill DeWine vetoed went further to shield children from medicalization than his executive order.

entry.title: Female Boxers Sound Alarm on Men in Womenâ€™s Division: â€˜You Could Dieâ€™
entry.summary: USA Boxing announced last week that it would allow males to fight females provided they undergo transition surgery and suppress their testosterone.

entry.title: How Delaying Loan Repayment Hurt Student Borrowers
entry.summary: They got used to thinking of their loans as a freebie and now balk at paying them back. The answer is tough love and reform, not more handouts.

entry.title: Save Your Words
entry.summary: Amid the verbal sophistry of recent months, itâ€™s become increasingly clear that actions speak far louder.

entry.title: The Contest between the U.S. and China Is Coming to a Head in Vietnam
entry.summary: The U.S. and China are evenly matched in their relations with Hanoi. It matters a lot who comes out ahead.

entry.title: Itâ€™s â€˜Merry Christmas,â€™ Thank You Very Much
entry.summary: The disconnect between our reluctance to wish people a Merry Christmas and the sheer ubiquity of the holiday is vast.

entry.title: The Church in America Has What Global Catholicism Needs
entry.summary: The best way to breathe new life into the church is to empower laypeople to embrace their role in spreading the true and unsullied faith.

entry.title: Lumps of Coal Aplenty for Defilers of Culture, Decency, Humanity, and Truth
entry.summary: From art vandalizers to plagiarizing, prevaricating college presidents, many in our society should expect lumps of coal in their stockings this year.

entry.title: Exclusive: Trump Surges in National Poll as Majority of Voters Doubt Biden Will Complete Second Term If Reelected
